short_summary: The objective is to acquire goods and services from a certified Lenel Value-Added Reseller (VAR) to replace the existing legacy physical security system used in PSPC tenant spaces at L’s Esplanade Laurier with Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC)’s new Lenel system.
description: The objective is to acquire goods and services from a certified Lenel Value-Added Reseller (VAR) to replace the existing legacy physical security system used in PSPC tenant spaces at L’s Esplanade Laurier with Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC)’s new Lenel system.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Lenel Migration Project – Phase 3**

**Notice ID**: cb-584-16297229

**Amendment Number**: 11
**Solicitation Number**: 10078007

**Publication Date**: 2023-12-08
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-29 14:00:00 (Expires)

**Description**
---------------

The Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) seeks a certified Lenel Value-Added Reseller (VAR) to replace the existing legacy physical security system used in PSPC tenant spaces at L’Esplanade Laurier with PSPC’s new Lenel system.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The selected contractor will be responsible for delivering goods and services from a certified Lenel VAR to replace the existing physical security system. The scope of work includes:

* Replacing the existing legacy physical security system with PSPC’s new Lenel system
* Ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements
* Conducting a mandatory site visit

**Requirements**
----------------

* Contractors must be included in the Supply Arrangement (E60HN-200ACS/XXX/HN)
* No components or labor not included in the Supply Arrangement can be part of the quote
* A mandatory site visit is required
* All questions must be submitted in writing to the PSPC Contracting Authority

**Accommodations**
-----------------

* Contractors requiring accommodations must notify PSPC in writing at least 72 hours prior to the mandatory site visit
* Accommodations will be arranged to meet the contractor’s needs

**Attachments**
----------------

The following documents are attached to this notice:

* List of contact persons and contact information
* GENERAL NOTES sheet
* SOW

**CPreserving the business continuity and the migration process goes above and beyond the current ask from PSPC. TSee attachments for more details.*
 
Come prepared and ready to answer any further Qs as needed to help support, construction, and to help build positive relationships between all trade partners with PSPC
 

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans
